‘Golden Byte’ is a compact, high-potency calendula cultivar bred specifically for dual-purpose culinary and topical use in urban settings. This dwarf variety produces an abundance of vibrant, fully double orange and gold flowers rich in bioactive compounds, while maintaining a tidy, bushy habit perfect for container growing. Unlike traditional calendulas, ‘Golden Byte’ offers a more complex flavor profile and higher concentration of beneficial compounds in a space-efficient form.
